# Data process



## HRS

### Wave 1

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `R1ARTHRE` |
|-|-|
| **Label** | `R1ARTHRE:W1 R ever had arthritis`|
| **Table name**  | `HRS-HRS-w1`|
| **Categories** | `0 = no`<br/>`1 = yes` |
| **Missings** | `NA` |
| **Description** |  |

```{r assign hrs_w1, echo=F}

opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'HRS_hrs_w1','HRS.HRS-HRS-w1',variables=list('R1ARTHRE'), missings = T)
HRS_hrs_w1 <- opal.execute(o,'HRS_hrs_w1')

```

```{r local hrs_w1, echo=F}

vbl <- HRS_hrs_w1$R1ARTHRE
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)[2], caption = names(HRS_hrs_w1)[2])
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)[1], caption = "Category")

ggplot(HRS_hrs_w1, aes(x=factor(R1ARTHRE))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

```


#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `keep up 1 into 1`
* `keep up 0 into 0`
* `NA into 999`

Age of diagnosis cannot be harmonized.

**R script:**

```{r harmo hrs_w1}

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w1 <- tibble(id=HRS_hrs_w1$id)
HRS_ds_hrs_w1$h_joint_disorders <- car::recode(HRS_hrs_w1$R1ARTHRE, "NA=999")

# We build a global table in order to have updated the status of all the individuals through the different waves
HRS_ds_hrs <- HRS_ds_hrs_w1
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_ds_hrs$id))

```


#### Statistics of the new harmonized variable

```{r descript hrs_w1, echo=F}

vbl <- HRS_ds_hrs_w1$h_joint_disorders
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(HRS_ds_hrs_w1, aes(x=factor(h_joint_disorders))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")

```


#### Validation

```{r crosstabulation hrs_w1, echo=F}

AfterH <- table(HRS_ds_hrs_w1$h_joint_disorders, useNA = "ifany")
BeforeH <- table(HRS_hrs_w1$R1ARTHRE, useNA = "ifany")
C <- rbind(BeforeH,AfterH)
colnames(C) <- c("0->0","1->1","NA->999")
kable(C)
rm(HRS_hrs_w1)

```



### Wave 2

| **Categories** | `0 = no`<br/>`1 = yes` |`continuous`|`continuous`|`continuous`|
| **Missings** | `NA`| `999 = Missing` |  |  |

```{r assign hrs_w2, echo=F}

opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'HRS_hrs_w2','HRS.HRS-HRS-w2',variables=list('R2ARTHRE'), missings = T)

load(paste0(datafolder,"hrs_w2/ybirth.RData"))

HRS_hrs_w2 <- left_join(HRS_hrs_w2,yintw, by="id")
names(HRS_hrs_w2)[5] <- "yintw_hrs_w2"

```

```{r local hrs_w2, echo=F}

vbl <- HRS_hrs_w2$R2ARTHRE
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)[2], caption = names(HRS_hrs_w2)[2])
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)[1], caption = "Category")

ggplot(HRS_hrs_w2, aes(x=factor(R2ARTHRE))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

vbl <- HRS_hrs_w2$ybirth
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = names(HRS_hrs_w2)[3])
pander(Continuous_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(HRS_hrs_w2 %>% filter(!vbl %in% miss_values_vector), aes(ybirth)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

vbl <- HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w1
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = names(HRS_hrs_w2)[4])
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")

ggplot(HRS_hrs_w2, aes(x=factor(yintw_hrs_w1))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

vbl <- HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w2
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = names(HRS_hrs_w2)[5])

ggplot(HRS_hrs_w2, aes(x=factor(yintw_hrs_w2))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

```


#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R1ARTHRE == 0 and R2ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R1ARTHRE == 1 or R2ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w2 and 0 in w1, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w2-year of interview w1)/2+(year of interview w1 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo hrs_w2}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_hrs_w2 <- left_join(HRS_hrs_w2, HRS_ds_hrs, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w2 <- tibble(id=HRS_hrs_w2$id)
HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w2$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w2$R2ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w2$R2ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w2$R2ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w2$R2ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_hrs_w2$R2ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w2$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w2$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w2 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w1 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w2[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w2$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w2 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w1 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w1[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w2$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w2 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w1 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_hrs_w2$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w2$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w2 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w2$yintw_hrs_w1 %in% miss_values_vector))])

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_hrs[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_hrs_w2,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w2$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_hrs$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w2$id) & (HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

#### Validation

```{r crosstabulation hrs_w2, echo=F, results='asis'}

X <- c(
  sum(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w2$R2ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w2$R2ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders != 1)),
  sum(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w2$R2ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w2$R2ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_hrs_w2$R2ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w2$h_joint_disorders == 1))
)
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R1ARTHRE == 0 and R2ARTHRE == 0 and R3ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R1ARTHRE == 1 or R2ARTHRE == 1 or R3ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w3 and 0 in w2, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w3-year of interview w2)/2+(year of interview w2 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w3 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo hrs_w3}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_hrs_w3 <- left_join(HRS_hrs_w3, HRS_ds_hrs, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w3 <- tibble(id=HRS_hrs_w3$id)
HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w3$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w3$R3ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w3$R3ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w3$R3ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w3$R3ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_hrs_w3$R3ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w3$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w3$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w3$yintw_hrs_w3 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w3$yintw_hrs_w2 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_hrs_w3$yintw_hrs_w3[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w3$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w3$yintw_hrs_w3 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w3$yintw_hrs_w2 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_hrs_w3$yintw_hrs_w2[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w3$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w3$yintw_hrs_w3 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w3$yintw_hrs_w2 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_hrs_w3$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w3$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w3$yintw_hrs_w3 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w3$yintw_hrs_w2 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_hrs[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_hrs_w3,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w3$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_hrs$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w3$id) & (HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w3$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R1ARTHRE == 0 and R2ARTHRE == 0 and R3ARTHRE == 0 and R4ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R1ARTHRE == 1 or R2ARTHRE == 1 or R3ARTHRE == 1 or R4ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w4 and 0 in w3, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w4-year of interview w3)/2+(year of interview w3 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w4 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo hrs_w4}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_hrs_w4 <- left_join(HRS_hrs_w4, HRS_ds_hrs, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w4 <- tibble(id=HRS_hrs_w4$id)
HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w4$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w4$R4ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w4$R4ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w4$R4ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w4$R4ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_hrs_w4$R4ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w4$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w4$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w4$yintw_hrs_w4 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w4$yintw_hrs_w3 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_hrs_w4$yintw_hrs_w4[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w4$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w4$yintw_hrs_w4 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w4$yintw_hrs_w3 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_hrs_w4$yintw_hrs_w3[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w4$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w4$yintw_hrs_w4 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w4$yintw_hrs_w3 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_hrs_w4$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w4$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w4$yintw_hrs_w4 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w4$yintw_hrs_w3 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_hrs[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_hrs_w4,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w4$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_hrs$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w4$id) & (HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w4$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R1ARTHRE == 0 and R2ARTHRE == 0 and R3ARTHRE == 0 and R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R1ARTHRE == 1 or R2ARTHRE == 1 or R3ARTHRE == 1 or R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w6 and 0 in w5, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w6-year of interview w5)/2+(year of interview w5 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w6 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo hrs_w6}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_hrs_w6 <- left_join(HRS_hrs_w6, HRS_ds_hrs, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w6 <- tibble(id=HRS_hrs_w6$id)
HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w6$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w6$R6ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w6$R6ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w6$R6ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w6$R6ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_hrs_w6$R6ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w6$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w6$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w6$yintw_hrs_w6 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w6$yintw_hrs_w5 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_hrs_w6$yintw_hrs_w6[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w6$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w6$yintw_hrs_w6 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w6$yintw_hrs_w5 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_hrs_w6$yintw_hrs_w5[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w6$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w6$yintw_hrs_w6 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w6$yintw_hrs_w5 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_hrs_w6$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w6$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w6$yintw_hrs_w6 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w6$yintw_hrs_w5 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_hrs[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_hrs_w6,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w6$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_hrs$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w6$id) & (HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w6$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R1ARTHRE == 0 and R2ARTHRE == 0 and R3ARTHRE == 0 and R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 and R7ARTHRE == 0 and R8ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R1ARTHRE == 1 or R2ARTHRE == 1 or R3ARTHRE == 1 or R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 or R7ARTHRE == 1 or R8ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w8 and 0 in w7, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w8-year of interview w7)/2+(year of interview w7 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w8 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo hrs_w8}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_hrs_w8 <- left_join(HRS_hrs_w8, HRS_ds_hrs, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w8 <- tibble(id=HRS_hrs_w8$id)
HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w8$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w8$R8ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w8$R8ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w8$R8ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w8$R8ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_hrs_w8$R8ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w8$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w8$yintw_hrs_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w8$yintw_hrs_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_hrs_w8$yintw_hrs_w8[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w8$yintw_hrs_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w8$yintw_hrs_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_hrs_w8$yintw_hrs_w7[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w8$yintw_hrs_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w8$yintw_hrs_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_hrs_w8$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w8$yintw_hrs_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w8$yintw_hrs_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_hrs[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_hrs_w8,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w8$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_hrs$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w8$id) & (HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w8$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R1ARTHRE == 0 and R2ARTHRE == 0 and R3ARTHRE == 0 and R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 and R7ARTHRE == 0 and R8ARTHRE == 0 and R9ARTHRE == 0 and R10ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R1ARTHRE == 1 or R2ARTHRE == 1 or R3ARTHRE == 1 or R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 or R7ARTHRE == 1 or R8ARTHRE == 1 or R9ARTHRE == 1 or R10ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w10 and 0 in w9, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w10-year of interview w9)/2+(year of interview w9 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w10 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo hrs_w10}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_hrs_w10 <- left_join(HRS_hrs_w10, HRS_ds_hrs, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w10 <- tibble(id=HRS_hrs_w10$id)
HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w10$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w10$R10ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w10$R10ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_hrs_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_hrs_w10$id))
HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w10$yintw_hrs_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w10$yintw_hrs_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_hrs_w10$yintw_hrs_w10[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w10$yintw_hrs_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w10$yintw_hrs_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_hrs_w10$yintw_hrs_w9[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w10$yintw_hrs_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w10$yintw_hrs_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_hrs_w10$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_hrs_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_hrs_w10$yintw_hrs_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_hrs_w10$yintw_hrs_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_hrs[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_hrs_w10,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w10$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_hrs$id %in% HRS_ds_hrs_w10$id) & (HRS_ds_hrs$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_hrs_w10$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R2ARTHRE == 0 and R3ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R2ARTHRE == 1 or R3ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w3 and 0 in w2, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w3-year of interview w2)/2+(year of interview w2 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo ahead_w3}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_ahead_w3 <- left_join(HRS_ahead_w3, HRS_ds_ahead, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_ahead_w3 <- tibble(id=HRS_ahead_w3$id)
HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_ahead_w3$id))
HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_ahead_w3$R3ARTHRE)) & HRS_ahead_w3$R3ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_ahead_w3$R3ARTHRE)) & HRS_ahead_w3$R3ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_ahead_w3$R3ARTHRE)) & HRS_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_ahead_w3$id))
HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w3$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w3$yintw_ahead_w3 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w3$yintw_ahead_w2 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_ahead_w3$yintw_ahead_w3[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w3$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w3$yintw_ahead_w3 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w3$yintw_ahead_w2 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_ahead_w3$yintw_ahead_w2[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w3$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w3$yintw_ahead_w3 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w3$yintw_ahead_w2 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_ahead_w3$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w3$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w3$yintw_ahead_w3 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w3$yintw_ahead_w2 %in% miss_values_vector))])

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_ahead[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_ahead_w3,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_ahead_w3$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_ahead$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_ahead$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_ahead$id %in% HRS_ds_ahead_w3$id) & (HRS_ds_ahead$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w3$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R2ARTHRE == 0 and R3ARTHRE == 0 and R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R2ARTHRE == 1 or R3ARTHRE == 1 or R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w6 and 0 in w5, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w6-year of interview w5)/2+(year of interview w5 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w6 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R2ARTHRE == 0 and R3ARTHRE == 0 and R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 and R7ARTHRE == 0 and R8ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R2ARTHRE == 1 or R3ARTHRE == 1 or R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 or R7ARTHRE == 1 or R8ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w8 and 0 in w7, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w8-year of interview w7)/2+(year of interview w7 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w8 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo ahead_w8}
# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_ahead_w8$id))
HRS_ds_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w8$yintw_ahead_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w8$yintw_ahead_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_ahead_w8$yintw_ahead_w8[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w8$yintw_ahead_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w8$yintw_ahead_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_ahead_w8$yintw_ahead_w7[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w8$yintw_ahead_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w8$yintw_ahead_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_ahead_w8$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w8$yintw_ahead_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w8$yintw_ahead_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_ahead_w8$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R2ARTHRE == 0 and R3ARTHRE == 0 and R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 and R7ARTHRE == 0 and R8ARTHRE == 0 and R9ARTHRE == 0 and R10ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R2ARTHRE == 1 or R3ARTHRE == 1 or R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 or R7ARTHRE == 1 or R8ARTHRE == 1 or R9ARTHRE == 1 or R10ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w10 and 0 in w9, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w10-year of interview w9)/2+(year of interview w9 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w10 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo ahead_w10}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_ahead_w10 <- left_join(HRS_ahead_w10, HRS_ds_ahead, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_ahead_w10 <- tibble(id=HRS_ahead_w10$id)
HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_ahead_w10$id))
HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_ahead_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_ahead_w10$R10ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_ahead_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_ahead_w10$R10ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_ahead_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_ahead_w10$id))
HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w10$yintw_ahead_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w10$yintw_ahead_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_ahead_w10$yintw_ahead_w10[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w10$yintw_ahead_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w10$yintw_ahead_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_ahead_w10$yintw_ahead_w9[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w10$yintw_ahead_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w10$yintw_ahead_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_ahead_w10$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ahead_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ahead_w10$yintw_ahead_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ahead_w10$yintw_ahead_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_ahead[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_ahead_w10,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_ahead_w10$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_ahead$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders

HRS_ds_ahead$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_ahead$id %in% HRS_ds_ahead_w10$id) & (HRS_ds_ahead$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ahead_w10$h_joint_disorders != 999)]
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w5 and 0 in w4, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w5-year of interview w4)/2+(year of interview w4 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo coda_w5}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_coda_w5 <- left_join(HRS_coda_w5, HRS_ds_coda, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_coda_w5 <- tibble(id=HRS_coda_w5$id)
HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_coda_w5$id))
HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_coda_w5$R5ARTHRE)) & HRS_coda_w5$R5ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_coda_w5$R5ARTHRE)) & HRS_coda_w5$R5ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_coda_w5$R5ARTHRE)) & HRS_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_coda_w5$id))
HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w5$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w5$yintw_coda_w5 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w5$yintw_coda_w4 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_coda_w5$yintw_coda_w5[which(HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w5$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w5$yintw_coda_w5 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w5$yintw_coda_w4 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_coda_w5$yintw_coda_w4[which(HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w5$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w5$yintw_coda_w5 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w5$yintw_coda_w4 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_coda_w5$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w5$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w5$yintw_coda_w5 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w5$yintw_coda_w4 %in% miss_values_vector))])

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_coda[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_coda_w5,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_coda_w5$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_coda$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_coda$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_coda$id %in% HRS_ds_coda_w5$id) & (HRS_ds_coda$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w5$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`

**R script:**

```{r harmo coda_w6}
HRS_ds_coda_w6$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_coda_w6$R6ARTHRE)) & HRS_coda_w6$R6ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_coda_w6$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_coda_w6$R6ARTHRE)) & HRS_coda_w6$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization

assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")

  newtib
}
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 and R7ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 or R7ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w7 and 0 in w6, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w7-year of interview w6)/2+(year of interview w6 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w7 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo coda_w7}
# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_coda_w7$id))
HRS_ds_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w7$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w7$yintw_coda_w7 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w7$yintw_coda_w6 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_coda_w7$yintw_coda_w7[which(HRS_ds_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w7$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w7$yintw_coda_w7 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w7$yintw_coda_w6 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_coda_w7$yintw_coda_w6[which(HRS_ds_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w7$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w7$yintw_coda_w7 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w7$yintw_coda_w6 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_coda_w7$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w7$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w7$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w7$yintw_coda_w7 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w7$yintw_coda_w6 %in% miss_values_vector))])

assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]

  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 and R7ARTHRE == 0 and R8ARTHRE == 0 and R9ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 or R7ARTHRE == 1 or R8ARTHRE == 1 or R9ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w9 and 0 in w8, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w9-year of interview w8)/2+(year of interview w8 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w9 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo coda_w9}

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_coda_w9$id))
HRS_ds_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w9$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w9$yintw_coda_w9 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w9$yintw_coda_w8 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_coda_w9$yintw_coda_w9[which(HRS_ds_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w9$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w9$yintw_coda_w9 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w9$yintw_coda_w8 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_coda_w9$yintw_coda_w8[which(HRS_ds_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w9$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w9$yintw_coda_w9 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w9$yintw_coda_w8 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_coda_w9$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w9$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w9$yintw_coda_w9 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w9$yintw_coda_w8 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_coda_w9$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_coda[,c(1,2)]
```
```{r harmo coda_w10}
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_coda_w10,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_coda_w10$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_coda$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_coda$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_coda$id %in% HRS_ds_coda_w10$id) & (HRS_ds_coda$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_coda_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w10$h_joint_disorders != 999)]
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 and R7ARTHRE == 0 and R8ARTHRE == 0 and R9ARTHRE == 0 and R10ARTHRE == 0 and R11ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 or R7ARTHRE == 1 or R8ARTHRE == 1 or R9ARTHRE == 1 or R10ARTHRE == 1 or R11ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w11 and 0 in w10, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w11-year of interview w10)/2+(year of interview w10 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w11 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo coda_w11}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_coda_w11 <- left_join(HRS_coda_w11, HRS_ds_coda, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_coda_w11 <- tibble(id=HRS_coda_w11$id)
HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_coda_w11$id))
HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_coda_w11$R11ARTHRE)) & HRS_coda_w11$R11ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_coda_w11$R11ARTHRE)) & HRS_coda_w11$R11ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_coda_w11$R11ARTHRE)) & HRS_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_coda_w11$id))
HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w11$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w11$yintw_coda_w11 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w11$yintw_coda_w10 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_coda_w11$yintw_coda_w11[which(HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w11$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w11$yintw_coda_w11 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w11$yintw_coda_w10 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_coda_w11$yintw_coda_w10[which(HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w11$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w11$yintw_coda_w11 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w11$yintw_coda_w10 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_coda_w11$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_coda_w11$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_coda_w11$yintw_coda_w11 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_coda_w11$yintw_coda_w10 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_coda_w11$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
rm(HRS_ds_coda)
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w6 and 0 in w5, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w6-year of interview w5)/2+(year of interview w5 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w6 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo wb_w6}
# Continuous variable harmonization

HRS_ds_wb_w6$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w6$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_wb_w6$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_wb_w6$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w6$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_wb_w6$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 and R7ARTHRE == 0 and R8ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 or R7ARTHRE == 1 or R8ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w8 and 0 in w7, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w8-year of interview w7)/2+(year of interview w7 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w8 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo wb_w8}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_wb_w8 <- left_join(HRS_wb_w8, HRS_ds_wb, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_wb_w8 <- tibble(id=HRS_wb_w8$id)
HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_wb_w8$id))
HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_wb_w8$R8ARTHRE)) & HRS_wb_w8$R8ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_wb_w8$R8ARTHRE)) & HRS_wb_w8$R8ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_wb_w8$R8ARTHRE)) & HRS_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_wb_w8$id))
HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_wb_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_wb_w8$yintw_wb_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_wb_w8$yintw_wb_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_wb_w8$yintw_wb_w8[which(HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_wb_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_wb_w8$yintw_wb_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_wb_w8$yintw_wb_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_wb_w8$yintw_wb_w7[which(HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_wb_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_wb_w8$yintw_wb_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_wb_w8$yintw_wb_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_wb_w8$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_wb_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_wb_w8$yintw_wb_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_wb_w8$yintw_wb_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_wb[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_wb_w8,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_wb_w8$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_wb$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_wb$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_wb$id %in% HRS_ds_wb_w8$id) & (HRS_ds_wb$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w8$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R4ARTHRE == 0 and R5ARTHRE == 0 and R6ARTHRE == 0 and R7ARTHRE == 0 and R8ARTHRE == 0 and R9ARTHRE == 0 and R10ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R4ARTHRE == 1 or R5ARTHRE == 1 or R6ARTHRE == 1 or R7ARTHRE == 1 or R8ARTHRE == 1 or R9ARTHRE == 1 or R10ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w10 and 0 in w9, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w10-year of interview w9)/2+(year of interview w9 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w10 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo wb_w10}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_wb_w10 <- left_join(HRS_wb_w10, HRS_ds_wb, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_wb_w10 <- tibble(id=HRS_wb_w10$id)
HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_wb_w10$id))
HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_wb_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_wb_w10$R10ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_wb_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_wb_w10$R10ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_wb_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_wb_w10$id))
HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_wb_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_wb_w10$yintw_wb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_wb_w10$yintw_wb_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_wb_w10$yintw_wb_w10[which(HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_wb_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_wb_w10$yintw_wb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_wb_w10$yintw_wb_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_wb_w10$yintw_wb_w9[which(HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_wb_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_wb_w10$yintw_wb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_wb_w10$yintw_wb_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_wb_w10$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_wb_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_wb_w10$yintw_wb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_wb_w10$yintw_wb_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_wb[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_wb_w10,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_wb_w10$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_wb$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_wb$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_wb$id %in% HRS_ds_wb_w10$id) & (HRS_ds_wb$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_wb_w10$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R7ARTHRE == 0 and R8ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R7ARTHRE == 1 or R8ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w8 and 0 in w7, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w8-year of interview w7)/2+(year of interview w7 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo ebb_w8}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_ebb_w8 <- left_join(HRS_ebb_w8, HRS_ds_ebb, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_ebb_w8 <- tibble(id=HRS_ebb_w8$id)
HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_ebb_w8$id))
HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_ebb_w8$R8ARTHRE)) & HRS_ebb_w8$R8ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_ebb_w8$R8ARTHRE)) & HRS_ebb_w8$R8ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_ebb_w8$R8ARTHRE)) & HRS_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_ebb_w8$id))
HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ebb_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ebb_w8$yintw_ebb_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ebb_w8$yintw_ebb_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_ebb_w8$yintw_ebb_w8[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ebb_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ebb_w8$yintw_ebb_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ebb_w8$yintw_ebb_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_ebb_w8$yintw_ebb_w7[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ebb_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ebb_w8$yintw_ebb_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ebb_w8$yintw_ebb_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_ebb_w8$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ebb_w8$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ebb_w8$yintw_ebb_w8 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ebb_w8$yintw_ebb_w7 %in% miss_values_vector))])

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_ebb[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_ebb_w8,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_ebb_w8$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_ebb$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_ebb$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_ebb$id %in% HRS_ds_ebb_w8$id) & (HRS_ds_ebb$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w8$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R7ARTHRE == 0 and R8ARTHRE == 0 and R9ARTHRE == 0 and R10ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R7ARTHRE == 1 or R8ARTHRE == 1 or R9ARTHRE == 1 or R10ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w10 and 0 in w9, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w10-year of interview w9)/2+(year of interview w9 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w10 and other wave, h_joint_disorders_age as previously`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo ebb_w10}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_ebb_w10 <- left_join(HRS_ebb_w10, HRS_ds_ebb, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_ebb_w10 <- tibble(id=HRS_ebb_w10$id)
HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_ebb_w10$id))
HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_ebb_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_ebb_w10$R10ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_ebb_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_ebb_w10$R10ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_ebb_w10$R10ARTHRE)) & HRS_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_ebb_w10$id))
HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ebb_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ebb_w10$yintw_ebb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ebb_w10$yintw_ebb_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_ebb_w10$yintw_ebb_w10[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ebb_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ebb_w10$yintw_ebb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ebb_w10$yintw_ebb_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_ebb_w10$yintw_ebb_w9[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ebb_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ebb_w10$yintw_ebb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ebb_w10$yintw_ebb_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_ebb_w10$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_ebb_w10$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_ebb_w10$yintw_ebb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_ebb_w10$yintw_ebb_w9 %in% miss_values_vector))])
HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)] <- HRS_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders == 1 & !HRS_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age %in% miss_values_vector)]

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
assign_merge <- function(endtib,sttib,log_vec=c(T),col_end_index=NULL,col_st_index=NULL){
  newtib <- left_join(endtib,sttib,by="id")
  newtib[log_vec,col_end_index] <- newtib[log_vec,col_st_index]
  id_ind <- match("id",names(newtib))
  newtib <- newtib[,c(id_ind,col_end_index)]
  names(newtib)[2] <- "x"
  newtib$x <- car::recode(newtib$x,"NA=999")
  names(newtib)[2] <- names(endtib)[col_end_index]
  newtib
}
HRS_ds_prov <- HRS_ds_ebb[,c(1,2)]
HRS_ds_prov <- assign_merge(HRS_ds_prov,HRS_ds_ebb_w10,log_vec=(HRS_ds_prov$id %in% HRS_ds_ebb_w10$id),col_end_index = 2, col_st_index = 3)
HRS_ds_ebb$h_joint_disorders <- HRS_ds_prov$h_joint_disorders
rm(HRS_ds_prov)
HRS_ds_ebb$h_joint_disorders_age[which((HRS_ds_ebb$id %in% HRS_ds_ebb_w10$id) & (HRS_ds_ebb$h_joint_disorders != 999))] <- HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_ebb_w10$h_joint_disorders != 999)]

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `h_joint_disorders` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `R10ARTHRE == 0 and R11ARTHRE == 0 into 0`
* `R10ARTHRE == 1 or R11ARTHRE == 1 into 1`
* `otherwise into 999`

To compute `h_joint_disorders_age` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if h_joint_disorders == 1 in w11 and 0 in w10, h_joint_disorders_age = (year of interview w11-year of interview w10)/2+(year of interview w10 -ybirth)`
* `if h_joint_disorders == 0, h_joint_disorders_age = 996`
* `h_joint_disorders == missing into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo mbb_w11}

# We use the harmonized variable of previous waves instead of the study-specific variables
HRS_mbb_w11 <- left_join(HRS_mbb_w11, HRS_ds_mbb, by = "id")

# Categorical variable harmonization
HRS_ds_mbb_w11 <- tibble(id=HRS_mbb_w11$id)
HRS_ds_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders <- rep(999,length(HRS_mbb_w11$id))
HRS_ds_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_mbb_w11$R11ARTHRE)) & HRS_mbb_w11$R11ARTHRE == 0) & (HRS_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders != 1))] <- 0
HRS_ds_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders[which(((!is.na(HRS_mbb_w11$R11ARTHRE)) & HRS_mbb_w11$R11ARTHRE == 1) | ((!is.na(HRS_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders)) & (!is.na(HRS_mbb_w11$R11ARTHRE)) & HRS_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1))] <- 1

# Continuous variable harmonization
HRS_ds_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders_age <- rep(999,length(HRS_mbb_w11$id))
HRS_ds_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders == 0)] <- 996
HRS_ds_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders_age[which(HRS_ds_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_mbb_w11$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_mbb_w11$yintw_mbb_w11 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_mbb_w11$yintw_mbb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector))] <- floor((HRS_mbb_w11$yintw_mbb_w11[which(HRS_ds_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_mbb_w11$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_mbb_w11$yintw_mbb_w11 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_mbb_w11$yintw_mbb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector))]+HRS_mbb_w11$yintw_mbb_w10[which(HRS_ds_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_mbb_w11$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_mbb_w11$yintw_mbb_w11 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_mbb_w11$yintw_mbb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector))])/2-HRS_mbb_w11$ybirth[which(HRS_ds_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders == 1 & HRS_mbb_w11$h_joint_disorders==0 & !HRS_mbb_w11$ybirth %in% miss_values_vector & !(HRS_mbb_w11$yintw_mbb_w11 %in% miss_values_vector | HRS_mbb_w11$yintw_mbb_w10 %in% miss_values_vector))])

# We update the status of the individuals in the global table
rm(HRS_ds_mbb)
```

```{r summ_c, echo=FALSE}
l.hds <- lapply(hrs.ahead.cw, function(wname) if(hd_age_vbl %in% names(get0(paste0("HRS_ds_",wname[1])))){wname})

nullw <- which(sapply(l.hds, is.null))

if(length(nullw)!=0){
  l.hds <- l.hds[-nullw]
}



if(length(l.hds)>0){
  lmlist[[1]] <- aheadlist[[1]][sapply(l.hds,function(x)x[[1]])]
  lmlist[[2]] <- aheadlist[[2]][sapply(l.hds,function(x)x[[1]])]
  
  # Printing table of categories
  print(knitr::kable(summaries_c(lmlist[[1]],lmlist[[2]],lapply(l.hds,function(x)x[[2]]),hd_age_vbl),caption=ds_label_age))
}
```
